about_the_game:
Manage your City and your Population:
- Create Citizens that can reproduce or die based on different mechanics.
- Tax your Citizens as an alternative to obtain additional resources.
- Manage your Arks to keep a City well fed, strong and happy.
- Assign tasks intelligently to your Citizens to grow economically.
- Use Magnificent Runes that will enhance the enclosure of your City.



Master multiple and complex Battle mechanics:
- Create a group with friends and allies to march around the world to enemy castles or dungeons in 10 vs 10 open field battles.
- Strategically assemble different types of Units, Heroes and Pets to generate Synergy and have an advantage on the battlefield.
- Cast Spells and move your heroes in strategic areas to alter the outcome of any battle.
- Use the Rank Rotation controls strategically to maintain the survival of your Army and protect the weakest Units.
- Use the position rotation of Heroes and Pets to reinforce the rear or flanks of your armies in battle.
- Activate the Immersive Experience Mechanic and fight freely with your hero away from your Army anywhere on the battlefield in first person.
- Set a Maximum resistance point so that your Armies know when to Retreat.
- After a battle, quickly send your collectors to search for War Spoils, which represent 50% of the resource value of units killed in battle.



Adventure in dozens of dungeons on 4500km2 of real land:
- Navigate in real time through an open world shared by thousands of players.
- Kill all kinds of ferocious beasts in the hundreds of biomes of the Empire, Earth or the Underworld.
- Face powerful Bosses and Dungeons that have Legendary weaponry.
- Congregate with your Allies to gain Military advantage against all types of Objectives.
- Transport the necessary resources so that your armies do not lose life due to hunger or cold while they march.
- Carefully study the Weather and Routes so that your Resources are not affected by Storms or extreme Heat.
- Invest in improving the performance of your units and intercept other Players' armies to loot and weaken them.
- Find Resource Spots to extract food, wood, stone or gold from a source outside your City.



Make other Players pay to enter your City:
- Model your City with thousands of free decorations to provide an outstanding immersive experience to your visitors.
- Build houses to charge other players for accommodation.
- Build Merchants to sell your Merchandise to travelers or guests.
- Create SmartContracts in Taverns and Cities offering your Armies as Mercenaries in exchange for real money or other Items.
- Offer insider information on specific Avatar or Treasure locations in exchange for real money or resources using Smartcontracts.
- Sign temporary Peace agreements with other Players using Smartcontracts in exchange for Real money.



Create a Standard, your social, political and military representation:
- Create your Standard Bearer, a unique and unrepeatable Character that digitally represents you in most MMORPG mechanics.
- Apply as Captain, War Councilor or even King of a Kingdom once the Player Population of the Region you live in reaches 300 Players.
- Ride around the World touring other Player Cities, buying and selling all kinds of treasures and resources at their Merchants.
- Join other Players and Friends in all kinds of special Adventures in Dungeons or in the Open World.
- Build your own Convoy of Carts, Horses and other Transport to be able to load a greater amount of Resources and Items for your Commercial Management.
- Improve your Tents and Survival Arts so that your Bannerman does not waste time and rests more effectively when he is sleepy, hungry or cold.
- Share tents or mobility with your friends or allies to protect yourself from other users or beasts that prowl the open world at night.
- Participate in Tournaments and Events to win all kinds of Treasures and Titles that are very useful in Political Mechanics.



Become a King, Captain or War Councilor:
- Vote for those who will maintain the peace and economic prosperity of your region once it reaches 300 Players.
- Apply for a position so that other players can vote for you based on your experience, equipment and in-game credentials.
- Convert your Standard Bearer into Captain to command the Reserve Armies of all the Players in your Region to Kingdom versus Kingdom events.
- Turn your Standard Bearer into King to manage the Coffers that collect taxes from all Players in the Region.
- Invest in improving routes or the military advantage of the territory or steal resources to benefit you and your friends
- Be strategic to prevent your population from voting to Overthrow you, the only mechanic in the Game that puts the life of your Standard Bearer at Risk.



Research Magic and Technologies to Evolve your Kingdom:
- Study Architectural arts that will allow the building growth of your kingdom.
- Gain agricultural and mining knowledge to strengthen your economy.
- Research professions like blacksmithing to strengthen your army
- Learn the ancient Magic and Arts of War that will give you advantages on the Battlefield.
- Study Espionage arts to have an informational advantage over your enemies.



Join other Players to dominate the 3 Worlds:
- Create an Alliance and manage Ranks, Rights and Responsibilities
- Declare War on other Clans, Regions or Players
- Organize internal Tournaments or with other clans and use the Prize and Betting System.
- Make SmartContracts to establish Peace for Resources with Weaker Clans.
- Research special Technologies that will give advantages to your Clan Members.

legal_notice: Both the code of this product and its digital assets (creatures, heroes, units, pets, graphics, and more) are protected under Cosmic Realm Studios' Copywriting laws.
name: Holy War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit, or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6300U or AMD Ryzen 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520 or AMD Radeon RX Vega 11
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 28 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: CPU with AVX support required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit, or Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz 6-core (Intel i5) or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 970 GPU or AMD Radeon RX 570 GPU with 4GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 28 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: CPU with AVX support required

short_description: Get rich in Holy War like in real life as you kill, trade, conquer, rule, discover and master dozens of units, heroes, pets, dungeons and mechanics in a non-existent MMORPG/RTS/Moba/City Builder hybrid that runs on BlockChain in a Giant World.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*, Italian*, Korean*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
